name: Desolate Drive
description:
You find yourself in an ominous world with only one goal:

Destroy the towers.

Controls

Drive : WASD
Shoot : Left mouse button
Brake : Space
Boost : Right mouse button or Shift
Flip: Ctrl
Show controls and current objective: TAB or ESC

Credits

Game created for the Epic MegaJam 2020

By Hristo Enchev, Jan Gortnar, Konstantin Loffler, Marc Vassallucci, Jeffrey Vermeer

All code and assets were created during the duration of this jam with the following exceptions:

"Tomorrow" Font (Open Font License)

Water Puddle Simulation based on Content Examples by Epic

Sound asset files from Soundly, with the exception of Car engine sounds mixed from epic sample projects like the Advanced Vehicle one. 

Music is all under the Creative Commons license and it is from NIN Ghosts and various tracks from freemusicarchive.org.
